title: @Atlasize
description: Script to turn a volumetric dataset into an AFNI atlas

space.title: Space
space.description: Mark DSET as being in space SPACE

lab_file.title: Label File
lab_file.description: Labels and keys are in text file FILE. cLAB is the index of column containing labels, vVAL is the index of column containing keys (1st column is indexed at 0)

lab_file_delim.title: Label File Delimiter
lab_file_delim.description: Set column delimiter for -lab_file option. Default is ' ' (space), but you can set your own. ';' for example.

longnames.title: Long Names
longnames.description: Additionally, allow for another column of long names for regions, e.g., amygdala for AMY. cLONGNAME is the starting column for the long name continuing to the last name of the output.

last_longname_col.title: Last Longname Column
last_longname_col.description: Limit long names to nth column

atlas_type.title: Atlas Type
atlas_type.description: Set the atlas type where TP is 'S' for subject-based and 'G' for group-based atlases, respectively.

atlas_description.title: Atlas Description
atlas_description.description: A description for the atlas. Default is 'My Atlas'

atlas_name.title: Atlas Name
atlas_name.description: Name for the atlas. Default name is based on prefix of DSET.

auto_backup.title: Auto Backup
auto_backup.description: Back up the dataset if it already exists in the custom atlas directory and allows an overwrite

centers.title: Centers
centers.description: Add center of mass coordinates to atlas

centertype.title: Center Type
centertype.description: Choose Icent, Dcent, or cm for different ways to compute centers

centermask.title: Center Mask
centermask.description: Calculate center of mass locations for each ROI using a subset of voxels. Useful for atlases with identical labels in both hemispheres.

skip_novoxels.title: Skip No Voxels
skip_novoxels.description: Skip regions without any voxels in the dataset

h_web.title: Help Web
h_web.description: Open webpage with help for this program

h_view.title: Help View
h_view.description: Open -help output in a GUI editor

all_opts.title: All Options
all_opts.description: List all of the options for this script

h_find.title: Help Find
h_find.description: Search for lines containing WORD in -help output. Search is approximate.
